DeathSteel::

He nodded and walked out of the room. He went to the entrance of the 
base with a large smile on his face. He stopped at the doorway and 
wondered if he was going to make rank after this. He transformed into 
dragon mode and flew off. He headed towards the maximal base.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> The Major smiled and took Deathsteel's shoulder.
> 
> Tyrael: Then I am proud to give you this assignment, Deathsteel. 
Serve
> us well and valiantly!
> 
> He then returned to address Dreadplague and Darkangel.
> 
> Tyrael: So, Darkangel, you seem to have scouted the area between 
Pred
> and Maxi base, right?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> > DeathSteel::
> > 
> > He smiled. "I shall take the assignment. I'll have thier shields 
down 
> > in no time."
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > tYRAEL: No. You are still programed as a Predacon. Thus, 
they'll 
> > have
> > > it easy on you and will let you in their group in no time. 
That's 
> > the
> > > mission I want to give you.
> > >

> > wrote:
> > > > DeathSteel::
> > > > 
> > > > He looked at Tyrael. "You want me to infiltrate the maximals 
and 
> > > > lower thier shields when you come in for the attack?"
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> 
wrote:
> > > > > Tyrael: I believe you misunderstand my intentions. I want 
you 
> > there 
> > > > in
> > > > > order to disable their defenses and to prepare the way for 
when 
> > we
> > > > > destroy them.
> > > > >

<raccoon7679@y...>

> > > > > > 
> > > > > > He looked at Tyrael. "You wish me to spy on my fellow 
> > > > predacons.Then 
> > > > > > there is a reason not to trust."  He looked down in 
> > thought. "You 
> > > > ask 
> > > > > > this to protect the predacons from tretchery. Is there a 
bot 
> > > > > > inparticular you wish me to look after?"
> > > > > >
